alert.note: Alert for Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central West Feliciana and northeastern Pointe Coupee Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wakefield, or near St. Francisville, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Francisville, Wakefield and Spillman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
